mosinstall.description:
JoomlaWorks "Ultimate Content Display" Module v1.0

The "Ultimate Content Display" module by JoomlaWorks is a "super content retrieval" module and probably the only one you'll ever need!

It can fetch and display your Joomla! content or newsfeed items in any module position in 3 different ways. In a plain (unordered) list format, inside an ajax cross-fader or inside a jQuery-based cross-fader/slider! 3 unique ways to display your content or newsfeed items! So you can have for example a "latest news" side module, along with a cross fader box that retrieves content from a specific category dynamically and a content slider, acting as a "newsflash" box! Pretty cool, right?

The "Ultimate Content Display" module is actually the evolution of JoomlaWorks' popular "Ultimate AJAX Newsflash" and "Content Items Fading Scroller" modules and has been developed with ease of use and... practicality in mind! It's the kind of module you "set and forget", cause it simply works! Plus, it can help you create powerful Joomla! based portal websites, which require various types of "content" or "info" boxes.

Make sure you check out our official DEMO site to see the module in action.

Enjoy one more fine release from the folks at JoomlaWorks!

USAGE INSTRUCTIONS

First of all, check the parameters at the bottom of this page and set them accordingly (see the tooltip explanations for more)!
  • Make sure you must define at least one "content source ID" (for section, category, content item etc.) for the module to work!
  • In order for you to have multiple instances (copies) of the module at the same page, you must give each module instance (copy) a "Unique ID". Using this option you can have for example 3 copies of the module on your frontpage, one for displaying content in a list, another using the AJAX fader and the last one using the jQuery fader/slider. Or even more!
  • The module fully supports the latest stable release of Joom!Fish (1.7) for Joomla! 1.0.x. Which means your content will switch languages automatically, provided it is translated already using Joom!Fish.
  • The module is "plug 'n' play", which means you install it, set it up and publish it, without any changes to the code. The module will inherit your template's CSS settings and will merge nicely with the rest of the content. However, if you wanna style the module differently, all you need to do is modify the corresponding CSS file for each display type (list, ajax fader or jquery fader/slider). The CSS file is modules/mod_jw_ucd/XXX/mod_jw_ucd.css, where XXX is the display type: list, ajaxfader or jqueryfader (respectively).

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: uniqueid
param.label: Unique ID (required)
param.description: This ID must be unique and must only contain latin characters with no spaces or numbers. So keep it simple, like 'sidenews'! This option allows you to have multiple boxes inside your template and published in any position.

param.name: udc_displaytype
param.label: Content display type
param.description: How should we display our content? Highlights: 'Normal list' output an unordered -ul- list of items. The 'AJAX based cross fader' retrieves content dynamically, thus your web page loads faster. The jQuery fader/slider on the other hand provides a smoother fade and a cool 'slide' effect.

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the contents of this module or not? Use this option only when Joomla!'s cache is turned on.

param.name: where
param.label: Content source type
param.description: The type of source to retrieve content from. After this step you need to specify 'content source ID(s)' below.

param.name: where_id
param.label: Content source IDs (required)
param.description: The IDs of selected source type (above) to retrieve content/newsfeed items from. If you want to display content from multiple IDs, simply write the specified IDs, seperated by a comma (e.g. 2,5,6). You must specify at least one ID in order for the module to work!

param.name: ordering
param.label: Ordering
param.description: The order that content items will be presented (doesn't apply to Newsfeed Category/Newsfeed Item obviously!). Use the 'random' option if you wanna re-create e.g. a fading 'newsflash', replacing the default newsflash module inside Joomla!

param.name: count
param.label: Item count
param.description: The number of content/newsfeed items to display (default is 5).

param.name: show_front
param.label: Show frontpage items
param.description: Show/hide content items assigned to the Frontpage.

param.name: show_section_title
param.label: Show section title
param.description: Show/hide Section Title

param.name: show_category_title
param.label: Show catagory title
param.description: Show/hide Catagory Title

param.name: seperator
param.label: Section - category seperator
param.description: A seperator between the section title and the category title, when both are displayed.

param.name: plugins
param.label: Load Plugins (Bots)
param.description: Select whether to process or not plugins (mambots/bots) used inside content items.

param.name: display
param.label: Display option
param.description: Select whether you want to display the title only, the introtext only or both.

param.name: linked
param.label: Enable link in title
param.description: Select if you want the content item's title to link to the full text -if it exists- or to the related newsfeed.

param.name: datecreated
param.label: Show item creation date
param.description: Select whether to show item creation date or not.

param.name: more
param.label: Show 'Read More' Link
param.description: Select whether to show a 'read more' link below retrieved content item or not.

param.name: words
param.label: Introtext word limit
param.description: Word limitation for retrieved content item. Leave it blank if you DO NOT wish to limit the number of words!

param.name: chars
param.label: Introtext character limit
param.description: Character limitation for retrieved content item. Leave it blank if you DO NOT wish to limit the number of characters!

param.name: hideimages
param.label: Hide introtext images?
param.description: Select whether to show or hide images contained inside the item's introtext. Useful when you want to create a single-line news ticker that cross fades!

param.name: striptags
param.label: HTML cleanup
param.description: Do some HTML cleanup, especially when you limit the introtext by words or characters. This way you will not get 'unclosed' HTML tags like p (paragraph) that will cause your content to break. Use with caution! Allowed tags are: br, a, b, i, u, span. Adjust as necessery in the main php file of the module.

param.name: charset
param.label: Site encoding
param.description: Define your site's character encoding.

param.name: udc_ajf_width
param.label: Cross fader box width
param.description: Set the cross fader box width in either pixels or percentages, like '100px' or '80%'.

param.name: udc_ajf_height
param.label: Cross fader box height
param.description: Set the cross fader box height in either pixels or percentages, like '100px' or '80%'.

param.name: udc_ajf_delay
param.label: Rotation delay
param.description: Set here the rotation delay time (in miliseconds) between items. 1000 means 1 second.

param.name: udc_ajf_bgcolor
param.label: Background color (required for IE6)
param.description: Define the background color of the container. This option is required for IE to display the fade effect correctly.

param.name: udc_ajf_bottomfade
param.label: Show a smooth bottom fade?
param.description: Show/hide a smooth bottom fade. This option is ideal when the introtext exceeds in height the cross fader box height!

param.name: udc_ajf_cache
param.label: AJAX cache refresh (in minutes)
param.description: Set here how often the AJAX cache refreshes in minutes. IMPORTANT: Do not set to '0' except for testing reasons!

param.name: udc_jqf_cheight
param.label: Cross fader/slider box height (px)
param.description: Set the cross fader/slider box height in pixels/ems (like '100px'), but NOT percentages!

param.name: udc_jqf_anim
param.label: Animation effect
param.description: Choose animation effect.

param.name: udc_jqf_speed
param.label: Rotation speed
param.description: Set here the rotation speed (in miliseconds) between items. 1000 means 1 second.

param.name: udc_jqf_timeout
param.label: Rotation delay
param.description: Set here the rotation delay time (in miliseconds) between items. 1000 means 1 second.

param.name: udc_jqf_bgcolor
param.label: Background color (required for IE6)
param.description: Define the background color of the container. This option is required for IE to display the fade effect correctly.

param.name: udc_jqf_bottomfade
param.label: Show a smooth bottom fade?
param.description: Show/hide a smooth bottom fade. This option is ideal when the introtext exceeds in height the cross fader/slider box height!
